item.title: Financial Group Oddo Plans Foray Into Swelling Stablecoin Market
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Oddo BHF SCA is working on a euro-denominated stablecoin, people familiar with the matter said, an initiative that would bring it into an increasingly crowded market.Â The Paris-based financial group has been working with crypto technology firm Fireblocks on developing the instrument,...
